actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the child tax credit for taxable years beginning in 2008 and provide for the advance payment thereof.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of the child tax credit to $1,300 in 2008 and provide for the advance payment of such credit to eligible taxpayers prior to October 1, 2008.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the child tax credit for taxable years beginning in 2008 and provide for the advance payment thereof.
